description:
Kingdom Hearts is an action RPG following Sora on his journey 
through many worlds to find Riku and Kairi.

0.1.description:
Differences in this apworld when compared to the current 0.5.1 release:
- Client fix for displaying the correct required report amount when certain conditions are met
- Client fix for phantom checks sending when disconnecting and reconnecting without closing the client
- Postcard and puppies goal amount customization options
- Keyblade stat shuffle options
- Postcard randomization customization options (thanks to Goblin God)
- Several logic fixes (thanks to Goblin God)
0.1.title: KH1FM AP Beta Release

0.10.0.description:
- Adjusts a few options strings to be more accurate
- Adds slot name to slot data for use in mod generator

0.11.0.description:
- Added Accessory Augments, which are special effects that are attached to accessories.  They can be positive or negative.
- Hopefully fixed item link

0.2.description:
Differences in this apworld when compared to the current 0.5.1 release:
- Client fix for displaying the correct required report amount when certain conditions are met
- Client fix for phantom checks sending when disconnecting and reconnecting without closing the client
- Postcard and puppies goal amount customization options
- Keyblade stat shuffle options
- Postcard randomization customization options (thanks to Goblin God)
- Several logic fixes (thanks to Goblin God)
- Changed Cups option to a choice with a choice to not include Hades Cup (thanks to Goblin God)
- Superboss condition for Final Rest Door Unlock now adds superboss locations to the multiworld (thanks to Goblin God)
- Ice Titan is added if Hades Cup and a superboss option are enabled (thanks to Goblin God)
- Option to remove locations on the Jungle Slider minigame
- Starting Tools option that starts you with Scan and Dodge Roll
0.2.title: KH1FM AP Beta Release (0.2)

0.8.0r2.description:
- Added in Dalmatians Checks/Locations.  Dalmatians can be added to the item pool in one of three ways, in triplets as in vanilla, all 99 puppies as one item, or individual puppies (99 items)
- Added 100 Acre Wood checks and 2 torn pages into the item pool that aren't in their vanilla locations
- Added several missing checks
- All super bosses now have checks behind them
- Cleaned up the goals, removing world goals and instead adding a puppy hunt and super boss hunt option
- You can now choose whether Final Ansem is required or not
- Added Synthesis.  You can now Synth Destiny Islands items, which sends checks.  Each item requires an "Empty Bottle" to synth, which are added to the pool.

----------
### How to play:

1. Install OpenKH and the LUA Backend. 
- Download the latest release of OpenKH here: https://github.com/OpenKH/OpenKh/releases/tag/latest
- Extract the files to a directory of your choosing.
- Open OpenKh.Tools.ModsManager.exe and run first time set up.
- When prompted for game edition, choose PC Release via Epic Games Store and navigate to your KH_1.5_2.5 in the path box and click "Next"
- When prompted, install Panacea, then click "Next"
- When prompted, check KH1 plus any other AP game you play (KH2) and click "Install and configure LUA backend", then click "Next".
- Ensure that "Launch via Epic Games" is checked and click "Next"
- You do not need to extract any game data for KH1, so you can skip it if you choose
- Click "Finish"

2. Open "OpenKh.Tools.ModsManager.exe"
3. Click the drop down menu at the top-right and choose "Kingdom Hearts 1"
4. Click Mods>Install a New Mod
5. In "Add a new mod from GitHub" paste "gaithern/KH-1FM-AP-LUA"
6. Click Install
7. Navigate to Mod Loader and click "Build Only"
8. Place your kh1.apworld file in your worlds folder (usually /lib/worlds/)
9. Run ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
10. Click "Generate Template Settings".  This will open file explorer
11. Find "Kingdom Hearts.yaml" and copy it to /Players/ (create this folder if it does not exist)
12. Open the YAML file and change the line that says "name: Player{number}" to your desired player name.
13. Adjust the settings in the YAML to your liking
14. Run ArchipelagoGenerate.exe
15. Take the newly created AP_XXX.zip file in /output/ in upload it here: https://archipelago.gg/uploads
16. Open ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
17. Click "KH1 Client" and connect to your server hosted on archipelago.gg
18. Play!

----------

### How the randomizer works:

- All chests, clams, (most) events, and secret reports are randomized, and can contain any item, weapon, accessory, ability (shared or otherwise), spell, summon, world unlock, Olympus Coliseum cup, or trinity.
- Level up rewards are controlled by the server and no longer include abilities, those are found in chests.
0.8.0r2.title: KH1 AP v0.8.0

- Added setting to force Kingdom Key and all Dream Weapons to have bad stats (1 STR 0 MP) so that any keyblade you find is better.
- Added item and location group names
- Fixed Neverland World Terminus chest (thanks to Sonicshadowsilver2)
- Fixed a logic error with Page 5 of 100 Acre Wood

1.0.0.title: KH1 AP v1.0.0

1.0.4.description:
- The Mod Generator will now check if its on the latest version, and will prompt you to download an update if not.
- Keyblade locking is now fixed for previously broken locations - now all chests are properly locked.
- The randomizer has switched from using the seed zip format to a new proprietary format, `.kh1rpatch`.  You can still use old seed zips to generate mods if playing a legacy game.
- 3 new augments have been added:
	- Summon Boost: Increases Summon time multiplicatively, scaling with the usual Cheers + MP.
	- Grounded: Increases the speed in which certain ground attacks occur.
	- Finishing Plus: Grounded finishers can be cancelled into another finisher once per combo.
- A new setting has been added, `augment_abilities_from_pool`, which controls if abilities placed on accessories can only be found on that accessory.  Forced off if `remote_items = "off"`
- The Leon Secret Waterway/Kairi Oathkeeper event is no longer required to enter Hollow Bastion.  It is still required to enter Hundred Acre Wood.
- The gummi blocks > settings code no longer gives the player Warp-G, removing the ability to accidentally choose warp drive instead of normal drive on world select.
- Removed the Air Items augment since it causes issues with magic in the air
- Fixed a bug where AP Cost randomization would not be reflected in the seed
- Fixed a logic bug with keyblade locking + Crabclaw
- Fixed a bug where puppy settings would not be taken into account in the seed

1.0.5.description:
- Fixed a bug where talking to Phil and turning in Entry Pass but not proceeding to Prelims could softlock OC.
- Fixed a bug where enabling death link would enable D+G death link as well

1.0.6.description: - Fixed a bug where logic difficulty beginner would fail to generate in some instances

1.1.0.description:
- Changed how goals work.  Goals now simply define where victory is achieved.
- You can change the way you unlock End of the World.  It can either be a certain number of reports, or an item like the other worlds.
- The door to the Final Ansem battle must be unlocked.  You can define what makes this door manifest, choosing either delivering all postcards, turning in all puppies, defeating all super bosses (Sephiroth, Unknown, Kurt Zisa, Phantom), or collecting a certain number of reports.
- Added a new setting, "Cups" which allows for removing all locations behind completing cups from the multiworld.  The cup items themselves will still be in the pool, as they are required to face Sephiroth.
- Removed Ice Titan from the super boss list, as to not force the player to do cups
- Reduced the XP Multiplier cap from 10x to 8x to prevent Final Ansem from crashing the game.
- Under the hood generation fixes to make everything clean for PR
----------

- Click "Finish"

2. Open "OpenKh.Tools.ModsManager.exe"

4. Click Mods>Install a New Mod
5. In "Add a new mod from GitHub" paste "gaithern/KH-1FM-AP-LUA"

- Download the latest release of OpenKH here: https://github.com/OpenKH/OpenKh/releases/tag/latest
- Extract the files to a directory of your choosing.
- Open OpenKh.Tools.ModsManager.exe and run first time set up.
- When prompted for game edition, choose PC Release via Epic Games Store and navigate to your KH_1.5_2.5 in the path box and click "Next"
- When prompted, install Panacea, then click "Next"
- When prompted, check KH1 plus any other AP game you play (KH2) and click "Install and configure LUA backend", then click "Next".
- Ensure that "Launch via Epic Games" is checked and click "Next"
- You do not need to extract any game data for KH1, so you can skip it if you choose
- Click "Finish"

2. Open "OpenKh.Tools.ModsManager.exe"
3. Click the drop down menu at the top-right and choose "Kingdom Hearts 1"
4. Click Mods>Install a New Mod
5. In "Add a new mod from GitHub" paste "gaithern/KH-1FM-AP-LUA"
6. Click Install
7. Navigate to Mod Loader and click "Build Only"
8. Place your kh1.apworld file in your worlds folder (usually /lib/worlds/)
9. Run ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
10. Click "Generate Template Settings".  This will open file explorer
11. Find "Kingdom Hearts.yaml" and copy it to /Players/ (create this folder if it does not exist)
12. Open the YAML file and change the line that says "name: Player{number}" to your desired player name.
13. Adjust the settings in the YAML to your liking
14. Run ArchipelagoGenerate.exe
15. Take the newly created AP_XXX.zip file in /output/ in upload it here: https://archipelago.gg/uploads
16. Open ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
17. Click "KH1 Client" and connect to your server hosted on archipelago.gg
18. Play!

----------

### How the randomizer works:

- All chests, clams, (most) events, and secret reports are randomized, and can contain any item, weapon, accessory, ability (shared or otherwise), spell, summon, world unlock, Olympus Coliseum cup, or trinity.
- Level up rewards are controlled by the server and no longer include abilities, those are found in chests.

1.2.7.title: KH1 AP v1.2.7

2.0.0.description:
- Built-in save anywhere removed.  Replaced with a mod that always makes boarding the gummi ship available at save points
- Keyblade locking added.  Logic is as follows:
     TT   - Lionheart
     WL   - Lady Luck
     OC   - Olympia
     DJ   - Jungle King
     AG   - Three Wishes
     MS   - Wishing Star
     HT   - Pumpkinhead
     NL   - Fairy Harp
     HB   - Divine Rose
     EotW - Oblivion
     HAW - Oathkeeper
- Advanced Logic Added
- Many checks have been added or re-added
- Removed the "Obtained `e`" text, now all checks say "Obtained AP Item."
- Added a setting which forces junk in missable locations
- Added a setting which allows adding `EXP Zero` into the item pool.
- Added shared ability stacking, and a setting to have more shared abilities in the item pool
- Glide is now progressive.  First glide received will be glide, while consecutive glides become superglide.
- Added a setting that allows the player to interact (open chests, examine, talk) in battle.  This became necessary to have our own version because of keyblade locking
- Added code to allow any multiworld item in previously vanilla-only locations.  Now we have 10 postcards and 5 torn pages in the item pool.
- Adjusted logic for worlds to require at least 2 worlds logically.  This is to give the player some choice about where to go and hopefully will cut down on linear seeds
----------

2.2.2.description:
- Fixed logic for Hollow Bastion Lift Stop Under High Tower Sliding Blocks Chest
----------
### DISCLAIMER
Always check for updates in OpenKH for the AP Companion mod every time you play!  

- Click Settings > Check Mods for Updates
- If there are updates to the AP Mod, download them and rebuild your game using Mod Loader > Build and Run

### How to play:

BEFORE MODDING, PLEASE INSTALL AND RUN KH1 AT LEAST ONCE.

1. Install OpenKH and the LUA Backend. 
- Download the latest release of OpenKH here: https://github.com/OpenKH/OpenKh/releases/tag/latest
- Extract the files to a directory of your choosing.
- Open OpenKh.Tools.ModsManager.exe and run first time set up.
- When prompted for game edition, choose PC, choose which platform you are playing on (Steam or EGS), navigate to your KH I.5 + II.5 installation folder in the path box, then click "Next"
- When prompted, install Panacea, then click "Next"
- When prompted, check KH1 plus any other AP game you play (KH2) and click "Install and configure LUA backend", then click "Next".
- Extract game data for KH1 plus any other KH games you would like to mod.
- Click "Finish"

2. Open "OpenKh.Tools.ModsManager.exe"
3. Click the drop down menu at the top-right and choose "Kingdom Hearts 1"
4. Click Mods>Install a New Mod
5. In "Add a new mod from GitHub" paste "gaithern/KH-1FM-AP-LUA"
6. Click Install
7. Navigate to Mod Loader and click "Build Only"
8. Place your kh1.apworld file in your worlds folder (usually /lib/worlds/)
9. Run ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
10. Click "Generate Template Settings".  This will open file explorer
11. Find "Kingdom Hearts.yaml" and copy it to /Players/ (create this folder if it does not exist)
12. Open the YAML file and change the line that says "name: Player{number}" to your desired player name.
13. Adjust the settings in the YAML to your liking
14. Run ArchipelagoGenerate.exe
15. Take the newly created AP_XXX.zip file in /output/ in upload it here: https://archipelago.gg/uploads
16. Open ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
17. Click "KH1 Client" and connect to your server hosted on archipelago.gg
18. Play!

----------

### How the randomizer works:

- All chests, clams, (most) events, and secret reports are randomized, and can contain any item, weapon, accessory, ability (shared or otherwise), spell, summon, world unlock, Olympus Coliseum cup, or trinity.
- Level up rewards are controlled by the server and no longer include abilities, those are found in chests.
